summary: ELECTRIC POWER STEERING ASSIST HAS FAILED TWO TIMES. FIRST TIME EXPERIENCED NO POWER STEERING WHEN STARTING THE VEHICLE WAS STATIONARY.  THE SECOND TIME IT FAILED WAS WHILE DRIVING. VEHICLE WAS AT A STOP LIGHT AND WHEN TAKING A RIGHT HAND TURN THE POWER STEERING FAILED.  THE WHEEL WAS HARD TO TURN CAUSING MY DAUGHTER TO CROSS INTO ONCOMING TRAFFIC.
